sentences.english: Altogether, there are 538 electoral votes (including three for the District of Columbia, even though it has no voting representatives in Congress).
Chapter 5 is about the regional distribution of Juren in shandong in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第五章清代山東舉人的區域分佈研究。

sentences.english: When the nation began, the legislatures mostly named electors directly.
sentences.chinese: 在建國之初，議會通常直接指定選舉人。

sentences.english: It set new rules for counting the electoral votes of the states.
sentences.chinese: 它爲計數各州選舉人票的新規則。

sentences.english: The presidential race is decided by a state-by-state tally of electoral votes.
sentences.chinese: 總統競選按各州選舉人票的票數決定。

sentences.english: The Electoral College Plan itself was the compromise of various interests at the constitutional convention in 1787.
sentences.chinese: 總統選舉人團方案本身就是各種利益妥協的結果。

sentences.english: According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
sentences.chinese: 根據家譜的記載，我的先祖是清末一名舉人。

sentences.english: I admire you for a long time.
Exams give money to a larger number of quality, have to own account on the signature or initialed.
sentences.chinese: 質舉人舉錢數目較大，還得自己在帳上簽名或畫押。

sentences.english: Quality libraries to the quality of lifts, "quality of money post" as a ransom material evidence.
sentences.chinese: 質庫給質舉人“質錢帖子”作爲贖物憑證。

sentences.english: Without any modesty, Chu Jen Wang sat down in the seat of honour.
sentences.chinese: 王舉人也不謙讓，一屁股在上首坐了。

sentences.english: The states Mr. Trump won held 306 electoral votes.
sentences.chinese: 特朗普拿下的各州則持有306張選舉人票。

sentences.english: Independent voters are having second thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 獨立選舉人正在另作考慮。

sentences.english: Voters are telling  the Congress to shove its new tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 選舉人讓國會把新稅法報廢。

sentences.english: The lists of candidates shall be submitted to the Party organizations and voters for full deliberation and discussion.
sentences.chinese: 候選人名單要由黨組織和選舉人充分醞釀討論。

sentences.english: Only one Republican elector has publicly said he will not vote for Trump.
sentences.chinese: 只有一位選舉人公開表示不會投票給川普。
